Now, members have an option to view their Reputation Archive. Kindly check the source for a piece of detailed information. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5964259]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HF Ad Banners[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] is contemplating for some fresh Hack Forums Ad Banners to support the forum on the web and Social Media. If you are a Graphic Designer, go show off your skills. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5965208]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Suggestions for Canned Popularity[/color][/b]
If you want some new messages to be included in the canned popularity, go give out your suggestions. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5965314]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Game Update - #3[/color][/b]
A lot of new features has been added to the HF Game.
One of the essential features is the integration of Crew CP into Game CP. Read the dedicated thread for detailed information. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5965438]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3601559][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-nightmare.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Boruto Anime to Adapt Konoha Shinden Novel in New Arc[/color][/b]
This year's issue of Shueisha's Weekly Shonen Jump magazine announced that the Boruto: Naruto Next Generations anime will adapt the Naruto: Konoha Shinden novel starting May 12th. This focuses on Guy, Kakashi, and Mirai (the daughter of Asuma and Kurenai) and takes place at a hot spring. The novel is set between the final chapter of the original Naruto manga and the Naruto: The Seventh Hokage and the Scarlet Spring spinoff manga. This novel is suppose to help tie Naruto and Boruto together. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-04-27/boruto-anime-to-adapt-konoha-shinden-novel-in-new-arc/.146211]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Shonen Jump Magazine Starts 4 New Manga in Next 4 Issues[/color][/b]
The combined 22nd and 23rd issue edition of Shueisha's Weekly Shonen Jump magazine revealed on Saturday that the magazine will be launching four new manga series in the next four issues. The magazine hasconfirmed that "the Samurai 8: The Tale of Hachimaru) manga by Naruto Creator Masashi Kishimoto and manga artist Akira Okubo will officially debut on Magazine issue 24, on May 13th. The other three series to debut are Kentaro Fukuda's "Futari no Taisei" on May 20th, Kento Terasaka's "Beast Children" on May 27th, and Yuki Tanaka and Kento Matsuura's "Tokyo Shinobi Squad" on June 3rd.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-04-27/shonen-jump-magazine-starts-4-new-manga-in-next-4-issues/.146206]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Sony's Aniplex Aims to Start Full-Scale Chinese Animation Production[/color][/b]
Sony Music Entertainment's Aniplex subsidiary has established a Shanghai based subsidiary with the intent of starting on "full-scale" Chinese animation production. They will also be selling merchandise, the subsidiary will begin work in May. The report noted that Chinese animations market is projected to exceed 3 trillion yen (about $26.88 billion) in 2019. Aniplex is a production company under Sony Music Entertainment, the company also owns the subsidiary anime production companies known as "A-1 Pictures" and "CloverWorks". The subsidiary will begin direct-sales website for selling character figures, and other goods from titles like "Fate/Grand Order" game, and the "Natsume's Book of Friends" anime.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2019-04-30/sony-aniplex-aims-to-start-full-scale-chinese-animation-production/.146275]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-mimikyu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Sonic the Hedgehog Movie Trailer[/color][/b]
The new Live-Action movie trailer for Sonic the Hedgehog has been released, and it looks pretty cool. From the looks of it, Sonic has came to our world, and as soon as his presence was discovered, the US government decided it wants to get involved in trying to capture Sonic. So it seems as if they hired Dr. Eggman, so he can lend his assistance in trying to capture Sonic with all his crazy high tech gadgets. The movie is set to be released on November 8, 2019.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FvvZaBf9QQI] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker Teaser[/color][/b]
Yes, there is a new Star Wars movie coming out, "The Rise of Skywalker" is the latest movie in the Star Wars movie saga, and apparently the last one as well. I personally have always been a fan of the Star Wars series, though i thought it was much better and more brutal before Disney took over the franchise. Nonetheless, i still plan on watching this new Star Wars movie when it comes out. The movie is said to be released somewhere around Christmas time in 2019.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=adzYW5DZoWs] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]


[b][color=white]PewDiePie pushes to end the "Subscribe to PewDiePie" meme[/color][/b]
Im sure almost everybody on here has heard the good old "Subscribe to PewDiePie" meme that's gone around in order to support one of the funniest YouTubers of all time, PewDiePie. But just recently he released a new video, mentioning that the meme has got to come to a stop. Why does he want this to stop you may ask? Well, he mentions in his video that yes he has millions of subscribers, and some of those millions are obviously degenerates or trouble makers. He was not very happy when some vandals spray painted on a WWII memorial "Sub to PewDiePie." He clearly mentions he doesn't want the hateful acts to overpower all these amazing things other people were trying to do. But what really set him off was the fact that the New Zealand shooter mentions "Subscribe to PewDiePie" as he was live streaming the massacre of the Muslim people in those mosques. Check out his video to learn more about this situation. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ah5MYGQBYRo]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Coachella Fest 2019 Herpes Outbreak[/color][/b]
This years Coachella was wild. I'm not saying the other years weren't wild, but this year there seems to of been a massive herpes outbreak after the festivals were over. There were reports of over 250 cases of herpes per day throughout the festival season. Both weekends 1 and 2 were affected by the outbreak, and so was the festival that followed after, Stagecoach. Yes i was there personally working the event and no, i didn't catch the herpes thankfully. So i can happily say that i am marked safe from the herpes outbreak.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pFKW7G1l7Pk] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]
